basics.name: Daxter Ryan
basics.label: Developer
basics.summary: I am a full stacking web developer who can build apps from the ground up. I worked mostly at startups so I am used to wearing many hats. I am a very product focussed developer who practices, user feedback first and. I generally very flexible when investigating new roles.

references.reference: i have worked with Daxter on several different occasions in different positions he has held. when it came time to redesign my web site. he was the first, css was able and a high level of knowledge, understanding of the java complex topics from programming, the concept to from the completion, and was as well several disney mobile., as he always demonstrated his enormous knowledge of structured thinking. he understands both the creative and the technical process, making him an invaluable member of any web design development team., i am good at working indipendently also knows how to motivate my team well., head of technical department, roamtech solutions limited, it is my pleasure to recommend david, his performance working as a intern for hivelocity hosting proved that he will be a valuable addition to your company. clickbalance
